articles.image_title: Boris Becker court case. Three-time Wimbledon champion Boris Becker, arrives alongside partner Lilian de Carvalho Monteiro, for sentencing at Southwark Crown Court, in London, after he was found guilty of four charges under the Insolvency Act during his bankruptcy trial. Picture date: Friday April 29, 2022. See PA story COURTS Becker. Photo credit should read: Victoria Jones/PA Wire URN:66614759
